summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4321 for the improvement of 13th Avenue South, from Dawson Street to Snoqualmie Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers together with the necessary appurtenances and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 51223, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
